game_description: Prospect is the leading VR platform for BIM & VDC teams and design firms to collaborate and perform model coordination. With one click, you and your team can instantly walk through 3D models from Revit, Navisworks, SketchUp, Rhino, and more in your Oculus Quest to perform QA/QC, design review, trade coordination, and more. Prospect by IrisVR helps top ENR firms around the world instantly resolve model issues and catch errors that would have remained hidden using only 2D and traditional 3D methods, cutting down on rework costs and project delays. Our Quest app allows you to: - Sync models between your Prospect Desktop Library and the cloud with one click - Inspect individual elements to view BIM in VR - Measure, make markups, and capture Screenshots - Compile PDF Reports to capture feedback from VR meetings and track issues
review_1: Former Rift S user, was hesitant to try my workflow untethered on mq2. Runs brilliantly with or without PC link. Link lets me broadcast my collab prospect sessions on MS Teams for non vr participants. Issue tracking, robust tools. Absolute workhorse. Autodesk bought another gem. Free guest access using join codes makes running BIM calls with distributed teams a dream.
